thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent For Paris Standards
thread.title_full: Excellent For Paris Standards - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: zalthawa
title: Excellent For Paris Standards
text:
Large rooms, excellent service, the price was fantastic.
The area is quite, walking distance from the quartier's market area, and allot of very authentic small restaurants alongside michelin starred restaurants.
the staff were helpful and were very polite.
we were given an extra large room, and we were allowed to store our babies pram at the reception.
It is definitely a hotel we will keep in mind the next time we are in Paris.
Room Tip: If you have a baby or a special request, the staff will be nice enough to offer you one. See more room tips
